description: This file defines a FastAPI backend for a unified connector API, primarily managing integrations with Atlassian services like Jira and Confluence. It includes API endpoints for health checks, root information, and configuring/testing Jira and Confluence credentials with basic authentication checks.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: Response model for health check endpoint, indicating service status.

classes.name: IntegrationConfigRequest
classes.description: Model for incoming Jira/Confluence integration configuration containing URL, email/username, and API token.

classes.name: IntegrationTestResponse
classes.description: Model representing the outcome of a connection test, indicating success and providing a message.

methods.name: str _basic_auth_header(username: str, token: str)
methods.description: Constructs a Basic Auth header value from username and token.

methods.name: int _http_get(host: str, path: str, scheme: str, headers: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request with http.client; returns the status code.

methods.name: (bool,str) _test_atlassian_basic(base_url: str, username: str, api_token: str, service: str)
methods.description: Performs a minimal authentication test against Atlassian Jira or Confluence endpoints, based on provided URL and credentials.

methods.name: read_root()
methods.description: Root endpoint that returns a confirmation message indicating the API is running.

methods.name: health()
methods.description: Health check endpoint that returns a simple 'ok' status.

methods.name: configure_jira(payload: IntegrationConfigRequest)
methods.description: Endpoint to store Jira credentials and test connection to Jira Cloud.

methods.name: configure_confluence(payload: IntegrationConfigRequest)
methods.description: Endpoint to store Confluence credentials and test connection to Confluence Cloud.

ctags.name: _http_get
ctags.pattern: /^def _http_get(host: str, path: str, scheme: str, headers: Dict[str, str]) -> int:$/
ctags.signature: (host: str, path: str, scheme: str, headers: Dict[str, str])

ctags.name: _test_atlassian_basic
ctags.pattern: /^def _test_atlassian_basic(base_url: str, username: str, api_token: str, service: str) -> (bool, /
ctags.signature: (base_url: str, username: str, api_token: str, service: str)

ctags.name: apiToken
ctags.pattern: /^    apiToken: str = Field(..., description="API token or personal access token")$/

ctags.name: baseUrl
ctags.pattern: /^    baseUrl: HttpUrl = Field(..., description="Base URL of the service, e.g. https:\/\/your-doma/

ctags.name: email_or_username
ctags.pattern: /^    email_or_username: str = Field(..., description="Email (for Atlassian) or username as requir/

ctags.name: message
ctags.pattern: /^    message: str = Field(..., description="Human-friendly message about the test result")$/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: str = Field(..., description="Overall service status string, e.g. 'ok' or 'error'.")$/

ctags.name: success
ctags.pattern: /^    success: bool = Field(..., description="True if the test connection succeeded, else False")$/
